Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI has the ability to give fully detailed feedback with no time limit, but a teacher will most likely not give any feedback and when it is given it is often very limited.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI made me feel like I had a better chance at improving my work because of the detail given and the unlimited amount it can give. Teachers donâ€™t often give feedback which can create a sense of stress or misunderstanding when any is given.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The amount of times you can receive feedback.
